name: Laneway Festival
artist: Tame Impala, Charli XCX, and The Strokes
description: Laneway Festival is an annual music festival known for its diverse lineup of indie, electronic, and alternative artists. It takes place in various cities across Australia, featuring multiple stages and a vibrant atmosphere.

name: Formula 1 Australian Grand Prix
description: The Formula 1 Australian Grand Prix is one of the highlights of the motorsport calendar, attracting top drivers and teams from around the world. The race takes place at the iconic Albert Park Circuit in Melbourne.

name: Byron Bay Bluesfest
venue: Tyagarah Tea Tree Farm, Byron Bay
artist: Jack Johnson, Norah Jones, and John Mayer
description: Byron Bay Bluesfest is Australia's premier blues and roots music festival, featuring a stellar lineup of international and local artists. Held annually at the picturesque Tyagarah Tea Tree Farm, it offers a unique festival experience in Byron Bay.

name: Sydney Writers' Festival
description: Sydney Writers' Festival celebrates literature and ideas with a diverse program of talks, panels, workshops, and literary events. It brings together acclaimed authors, journalists, and thinkers from around the world to engage in discussions on contemporary issues and storytelling.

name: Dark Mofo
description: Dark Mofo is a winter festival held annually in Hobart, Tasmania, celebrating the dark and avant-garde arts. It features a diverse program of music, art installations, performances, and provocative cultural events, embracing the winter solstice and exploring themes of darkness and light.

name: Darwin Festival
description: Darwin Festival is a vibrant celebration of arts and culture in the Northern Territory, featuring a dynamic program of music, theater, dance, visual arts, and outdoor events. Held over several weeks, it showcases the diversity and creativity of the region while fostering community engagement and cultural exchange.

name: Splendour in the Grass
artist: Kendrick Lamar, Arctic Monkeys, and Lorde
description: Splendour in the Grass is one of Australia's largest and most iconic music festivals, featuring an eclectic lineup of local and international artists across various genres. Set against the stunning backdrop of Byron Bay, it offers a memorable festival experience with live music, art installations, and creative workshops.

name: Melbourne Fashion Week
description: Melbourne Fashion Week is a premier event on the fashion calendar, showcasing the latest trends and designs from local and international designers. From runway shows to pop-up events and industry forums, it celebrates Melbourne's vibrant fashion scene and creative talent.

name: Adelaide Film Festival
description: Adelaide Film Festival is a biennial celebration of screen culture, showcasing the best in Australian and international cinema. From feature films to documentaries and experimental works, it offers a diverse program of screenings, workshops, and industry events, bringing together filmmakers, actors, and cinephiles.

name: Sculpture by the Sea
venue: Bondi to Tamarama coastal walk, Sydney
description: Sculpture by the Sea is an annual outdoor sculpture exhibition that transforms the coastal walk between Bondi and Tamarama in Sydney into a stunning sculpture park. Featuring works by leading Australian and international artists, it offers a unique opportunity to experience art in a spectacular natural setting.
